alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Berkshire County through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Becket, or 12 miles southeast of Pittsfield, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads. Locations impacted include... Lee, Becket, Dalton, Hinsdale, Peru, Washington, Becket Center, East Lee, Leisure Lee, West Becket, Bonny Rigg Corners and North Otis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
